lyric:
[by:velorie]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Sasha Sloan/Henry Agincourt Allen/Nicolle Galyon
[00:01.000] 作词 : Sasha Sloan/Henry Agincourt Allen/Nicolle Galyon
[00:03.62]I'd be cooler, I'd be smarter
[00:07.19]Probably be a better daughter
[00:11.11]I'd jump in a pool without thinking twice
[00:15.73]Take off my shirt like one of the guys
[00:19.23]I would save a lot of money
[00:22.88]I would say when I was hungry
[00:27.11]I'd throw on some jeans, not know the size
[00:31.38]Walk out the door and not wanna cry
[00:35.24]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[00:38.87]Where the walls didn't talk back at me
[00:42.79]Maybe I'd dream a bit bigger
[00:47.00]If there was nothin' to see
[00:50.73]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[00:54.36]Where the walls didn't pick me apart
[00:58.33]Maybe my skin would be thicker
[01:02.41]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[01:06.27]I'd be louder, I'd be honest
[01:09.97]Probably wouldn't be self-conscious
[01:14.16]I'd go to a party, not care who was there
[01:18.28]Not spend an hour pickin' what to wear
[01:22.16]Would've never dyed my hair blonde
[01:25.71]I'd have sex with all the lights on
[01:29.79]And I wouldn't pull away from his touch
[01:33.97]If he said I was pretty I'd think that I was
[01:37.82]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[01:41.37]Where the walls didn't talk back at me
[01:45.94]Maybe I'd dream a bit bigger
[01:49.87]If there was nothin' to see
[01:53.18]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[01:57.12]Where the walls didn't pick me apart
[02:01.48]Maybe my skin would be thicker
[02:05.03]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[02:27.44]I wonder what I'd be like
[02:30.85]Maybe I'd sleep a little better at night
[02:35.04]Yeah I wonder what I'd be like
[02:39.25]If I
[02:41.00]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[02:44.70]Where the walls didn't talk back at me
[02:48.93]Maybe I'd dream a bit bigger
[02:52.64]If there was nothin' to see
[02:56.47]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[03:00.42]Where the walls didn't pick me apart
[03:04.49]Maybe my skin would be thicker
[03:08.20]If I lived in a house with no mirrors
[03:14.27]I wonder what I'd be like
[03:22.00]Yeah I wonder what I'd be like
tlyric:
[by:velorie]
[00:03.62]我会更酷 会更聪明
[00:07.19]或许能让父母更骄傲
[00:11.11]我会毫不犹豫跳入泳池
[00:15.73]敢像别人那样脱去衣服
[00:19.23]我会有不少积蓄
[00:22.88]饿的时候会开口
[00:27.11]我会不在乎尺寸匆匆穿上牛仔裤
[00:31.38]走出门时不会想哭
[00:35.24]若我居住在无镜之屋
[00:38.87]那里墙壁不会反驳我
[00:42.79]或许我会梦得更辽阔
[00:47.00]若是可以什么都看不见
[00:50.73]若我住处中没有倒影
[00:54.36]那里墙壁不会批判我
[00:58.33]或许我能不那么介意评判
[01:02.41]若我居住在无镜之屋
[01:06.27]我会更坚定 更坦率
[01:09.97]或许就不会局促不安
[01:14.16]我会参加派对 不在意谁去
[01:18.28]不会花上一小时挑选衣着
[01:22.16]不会把自己头发染成金色
[01:25.71]我会能在灯光下肌肤相亲
[01:29.79]并且也不会避开他的触碰
[01:33.97]若他说我漂亮 我就会相信
[01:37.82]若我居住在无镜之屋
[01:41.37]那里墙壁不会反驳我
[01:45.94]或许我会梦得更辽阔
[01:49.87]若是可以什么都看不见
[01:53.18]若我住处中没有倒影
[01:57.12]那里墙壁不会批判我
[02:01.48]或许我能不那么介意评判
[02:05.03]若我居住在无镜之屋
[02:27.44]我在想自己会是什么样
[02:30.85]或许夜里我会睡得更香
[02:35.04]对 我在想自己会变成怎样
[02:39.25]如果我
[02:41.00]若我居住在无镜之屋
[02:44.70]那里墙壁不会反驳我
[02:48.93]或许我会梦得更辽阔
[02:52.64]若是可以什么都看不见
[02:56.47]若我住处中没有倒影
[03:00.42]那里墙壁不会批判我
[03:04.49]或许我能不那么介意评判
[03:08.20]若我居住在无镜之屋
[03:14.27]我在想自己会是什么样
[03:22.00]对 我在想自己会变成怎样
